snippet: Jamal Youse, who pleaded guilty in May to conspiring to provide material support to a Colombian terrorist organization, was sentenced to 12 years in prison on Thursday.
abstract: Jamal Yousef, former member of Syrian military who pleaded guilty in May to conspiring to provide material support to terrorist group Revolutionary Armed Forces of Columbia,  is sentenced to 12 years in prison in New York City.
lead_paragraph: Jamal Youse, who pleaded guilty in May to conspiring to provide material support to a Colombian terrorist organization, was sentenced to 12 years in prison on Thursday.

headline.main: Syrian Gets 12 Years in Terror Case
headline.print_headline: Syrian Gets 12 Years in Terror Case
